div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12

div.p: Let’s streamline your hotel business. We craft a solution which helps to manage your hotel’s room booking operations, room services system, customer database management, Amenities and staff management. Let’s check-inn…

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12
col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-12 align-self-center

div.p: Our Hotel Management System includes a user-friendly dashboard that shows you the current status of all your rooms in real-time. With just a glance, you can see which rooms are occupied and which are available. Plus, you can easily check future availability, helping you manage bookings efficiently and avoid overbooking. This feature lets you quickly respond to guest requests and keep everything running smoothly.

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-12 align-self-center

div.p: The system provides a flexible feature for creating rooms for different guest preferences. You can easily configure rooms with a variety of amenities, ranging from luxurious suites with premium features to budget-friendly options with basic facilities. Define and customize room categories, amenities, and pricing to match your hotel's distinct offerings. This adaptability allows you to accommodate a diverse range of guests, enhancing both guest satisfaction and revenue potential.

div.span: Store detailed information such as personal details, contact information, job history, skills, certifications, and emergency contacts.
Record employee check-in/check-out times, manage shifts, and track overtime.
Monitor absences, late arrivals, and attendance patterns.

div.class: col-xxl-12 col-xl-12 col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 align-self-center

h2.button: How to integrate this hotel management system with our existing odoo?

div.p: If you are using odoo.sh , odoo on premise or odoo community , then just download the appropriate version of this system and install it. *In odoo online (SaaS) version you can not install third party modules.

h2.button: Is it possible to customize this solution as per our needs?

div.p: Absolutely, You can customize it as per your requirement. If you have some specific requirement on hotel management, contact us on info@softhealer.com

h2.button: How to configure payment methods in hotel management?

div.p: To configure or implement other payment methods Contact us at support@softhealer.com
